articles.title: Ozone hole grows 3X the size of Brazil - Tech Explorist
articles.content: The ozone hole’s size changes frequently. The ozone hole’s size increases from August through October, peaking between mid-September and mid-October. The polar vortex begins to weaken and eventually … [+2320 chars]

articles.title: Chandrayaan-4 mission in spotlight after ISRO logs massive success with Chandrayaan-3 mission - HT Tech
articles.description: Chandrayaan-4 mission has grabbed the spotlight as ISRO winds down the Chandrayaan-3 mission again. ISRO is preparing for the LUPEX mission in collaboration with JAXA.
